metadata.title: CVE-2015-8890 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: platform/msm_shared/partition_parser.c in the Qualcomm components inAndroid before 2016-07-05 on Nexus 5 and 7 (2013) devices does not validatecertain GUID Partition Table (GPT) data, which allows attackers to bypassintended access restrictions via a crafted MultiMediaCard (MMC), akaAndroid internal bug 28822878 and Qualcomm internal bug CR823461.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
